name: jazzclub-backoffice
description: The back office for Jazzclub Karlsruhe
author: Andreas Leidig

scripts.compile: cd backend && yarn deploy && cd ../batchjobs && yarn tsc && cd ../shared && yarn tsc
scripts.deploy: yarn compile && cd vue && yarn build
scripts.clean-ts: cd backend && yarn clean-ts && cd ../batchjobs && yarn clean-ts && cd ../shared && yarn clean-ts
scripts.develop: yarn clean-ts && yarn compile && cd vue && yarn serve
scripts.test: cd batchjobs && yarn test && cd ../shared && yarn test
scripts.lint-all: cd backend && yarn eslint && cd ../batchjobs && yarn eslint && cd ../shared && yarn eslint && cd ../vue && yarn lint
scripts.clean-all-modules: rm -rf node_modules backend/node_modules batchjobs/node_modules shared/node_modules vue/node_modules
